name: Love In The Abyss
description:
Have You Ever Want A New Visual Novel To play? Or Interested On Story Plotwist And Not A Kinetic Novel? THEN THIS GAME IS FOR YOU!!!
===================
Its A Story About Two Brothers.. They Live Happy Life Until
Their Parents Died On An Accident(No Specified Reason)..
Due to This.. Chris(You) And Jack(Your/His Brother) Lived
On His Grandparents.. With Doesn't Last Long.. As Both Of 
Their Grandparents Died, With This Jack And Chris Lived
Together, Helping Each Other And Learning Together..
Until They Meet A Goddess(No Spoilers) And Sent On
A Big Adventure To Destroy All The Bad/Evil Person On
The Abyss/Hell Including the King Of the Hell Lucy...

This Game Is Still Heavy In Development.. And Now That
Im Back With Visual Novel.. Im Really Excited On What New
Things I Can Make.. And More!!!.. Still The Game Has No
Point And Click Part And Will Be Developed In 0.0.2!!
Also.. Due to This Visual Novel.. I Will Officially Drop
WWYLM As I No Longer Have the Files And Sounds..
Recovering It Won't Help As I Can't Find Any Of the File
And The Arts Ive Used Are Officially Required Licensing..
As For Other Question About the Development.. Then Comment Down!!
